statements: SELECT * FROM HealthCareMetrics WHERE target_achieved = TRUE;
SELECT metric_name, actual_value, timestamp FROM HealthCareMetrics WHERE target_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM HealthCareMetrics WHERE metric_description LIKE '%heart%';
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, actual_value FROM HealthCareMetrics WHERE actual_value < target_value;
SELECT metric_name, target_value, actual_value, timestamp FROM HealthCareMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT metric_name, actual_value FROM HealthCareMetrics WHERE target_achieved = true;
SELECT * FROM HealthCareMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_description, actual_value FROM HealthCareMetrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY actual_value DESC;
SELECT AVG(actual_value) AS avg_actual_value FROM HealthCareMetrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY metric_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_metrics FROM HealthCareMetrics WHERE target_achieved = false;
SELECT * FROM quality_assurance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC, metric_value ASC
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM quality_assurance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 5
SELECT * FROM quality_assurance_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%completion%'
SELECT id, metric_name FROM quality_assurance_metrics WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01'
SELECT standard_name, description, last_updated FROM patient_care_standards ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT * FROM quality_assurance_metrics
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM quality_assurance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100
SELECT MAX(metric_value) AS max_metric_value FROM quality_assurance_metrics
SELECT timestamp, metric_name FROM quality_assurance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, standard_name, responsible_team FROM patient_care_standards
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 50 ORDER BY metric_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM quality_assurance_measures WHERE measure_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM patient_records WHERE patient_age >= 18 ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_records WHERE patient_age < 30 ORDER BY patient_age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM quality_assurance_measures WHERE measure_description LIKE '%quality%' ORDER BY measure_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_records WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' AND patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY patient_age ASC;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 50 ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, metric_description FROM QualityAssuranceMetrics;
SELECT * FROM PatientCareStandards;
SELECT standard_id, standard_name FROM PatientCareStandards ORDER BY standard_id DESC;
SELECT tracking_id, tracking_date, tracking_result FROM PerformanceMetricsTracking WHERE tracking_result > 80;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital';
SELECT * FROM QualityAssuranceMetrics
SELECT metric_name, metric_description FROM QualityAssuranceMetrics ORDER BY metric_name ASC
SELECT standard_name, standard_description FROM PatientCareStandards WHERE standard_id = 1
SELECT provider_name, provider_type, provider_location FROM HealthcareProviders ORDER BY provider_location DESC

SELECT t.tracking_id, m.metric_name, s.standard_name, t.tracking_date FROM PerformanceMetricsTracking t INNER JOIN QualityAssuranceMetrics m ON t.metric_id = m.metric_id INNER JOIN PatientCareStandards s ON t.standard_id = s.standard_id ORDER BY t.tracking_date DESC
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_location FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_specialty DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_status FROM patient_records WHERE patient_status = 'Active';
SELECT qa_date, qa_description, qa_responsible_person FROM quality_assurance WHERE qa_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, metric_date FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_records WHERE patient_status = 'Active'
SELECT qa_date, qa_description, qa_responsible_person FROM quality_assurance WHERE qa_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_location FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_specialty DESC
SELECT analysis_id, metric_id, qa_id, provider_id FROM performance_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%good%'
